item.name: Lavendar Lullaby
item.description: Behold, the lavender candle: because your existence is so monotonous, you need a glorified wax stick to remind you of the outdoors. Let the soothing aroma of lavender mock your futile attempts at finding inner peace, while you drown in a sea of mediocrity.

item.name: Sagebrush Serenade
item.description: Because who needs a real adventure when you can light a candle and pretend you're having a thrilling encounter with a herb? Spoiler alert: Your life will still be as mundane as ever.

item.name: Chamomile Carnival
item.description: Because nothing screams excitement like the subtle scent of chamomile. Embrace the mediocrity as you reminisce about the days when you had dreams, before they were crushed by reality.

item.name: Birthday Cake
item.description: Presenting, the birthday cake scented candle: because apparently, the sweet smell of disappointment and aging is what everyone desires on their special day.

item.name: Cotton Candy Catastrophe
item.description: Transport yourself to a sugar-coated nightmare with this sickly sweet candle, guaranteed to give you a cavity just by smelling it.

item.name: Fruity Frenzy
item.description: Experience the overwhelming sensation of fruit punch overload, as if someone blended an entire orchard and poured it into a candle just for your olfactory pleasure.

item.name: Leather Lounge
item.description: Embrace the aroma of refined sophistication with this candle, perfect for pretending you own a library of rare first editions while you binge-watch reality TV.

item.name: Campfire Chronicles
item.description: Immerse yourself in the rugged essence of the great outdoors, and relive all those camping trips you never went on, now with added guilt and regret.
